DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial record use medical device EEVA™ ( Early Embryo Viability Assessment ) compare rate implantation transfer embryos select use score device EEVA™ plus morphology grade versus transfer embryos select use morphology grading .
DOC.brief_title: TiLE ( Time Lapse Eeva ) Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: All infertile subject treat In vitro fertilization ( IVF ) /intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) Subject age less equal ( < = ) 40 year Less equal ( < = ) 3 fail IVF/ICSI cycle At least 4 normally fertilize egg ( 2 pronucleus [ 2PN ] ) current cycle Normal uterine cavity Fertilization use ejaculated sperm ( fresh frozen ) Subject must read sign Informed Consent Form Have clinically significant systemic disease Have abnormal , undiagnosed gynecological bleeding Have contraindication Controlled Ovarian Stimulation ( COS ) assist reproductive technology ( ART ) gonadotropin use ART Egg donor cycle Planned `` freeze '' cycle ( oocytes embryos ) Concurrent participation another clinical trial
